

The simplest way to :doc:`create<object_creation>` a new *universe-of-discourse* is to call the :python:`create_universe_of_discourse` function:

.. code-block:: python

   u1 = pu.create_universe_of_discourse()
   ...
   # insert objects declaration code here
   ...


.. module:: core
    :noindex:
.. autofunction:: create_universe_of_discourse
